text:
William Morey (December 19, 1919 – December 10, 2003) was an American actor. He was known for his roles in "Death Race 2000" (1975), "Brainstorm" (1983), and "Real Men" (1987). He was also a television actor appearing on small roles in "Full House", "Fraiser", "Boy Meets World", and in "Beggars and Choosers".
Morey died in Santa Monica, California from natural causes, aged 83.
